items.title: Nifty Bank, Fin Svcs nearing correction; should you accumulate the dips?

items.title: Nifty, Bank Nifty PCR turns bearish; Longs added in MidCap; Shorts in RIL
items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 01: FIIs continue to hold more than 4 long positions in index futures for every short bet. Proprietary trades hold 5 shorts for every bullish bet in index futures.

items.title: Kalpataru Projects share up over 3% on Rs 1,241-cr order win; details here
items.description: The Kalpataru Projects International share rose after the company announced that it has been awarded new orders worth Rs 1,241 crore.

items.title: Northern Arc Capital share price rises 5% on strong June quarter results
items.description: Shares of Northern Arc, which listed on September 24 on the bourses, surged after reporting strong quarterly results in the June quarter of FY25 (Q1FY25).

items.description: Muthoot Finance, Manappuram Finance shares slipped after the RBI found several irregular practices being followed by gold loan financiers

items.title: Zee Media share hits 29-month high; zooms 79% in 1 week; what's the news?

items.title: Blue Dart Express climbs 7% after co announces price hikes in 9-12% range

items.title: Nifty monthly RSI flags warning sign; here's what happened in the past
items.description: Time to be cautious? In the past, the NSE Nifty 50 index has plunged as much 65% from its high after the monthly RSI peaked above the 80-mark. At present, Nifty monthly RSI stands near 83.

items.title: BSE, MCX shares jump up to 6% after transaction fee revision for brokers
items.description: BSE Share price surged up to 6.3 per cent at Rs 3,920 per share on the NSE, while MCX shares surged 3.8 per cent at Rs 5,879.55 per share intraday

items.title: Airline stocks IndiGo, SpiceJet gain after govt slashes ATF rates

items.description: The public issue of Vikran Engineering comprises a fresh issue of shares up to Rs 900 crore and an offer for sale (OFS) with promoter Rakesh Ashok Markhedkar offloading shares of up to Rs 100 crore
